function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shifts in energy use due to remote working and home cooking behavior changes during the pandemic","Impact":"Inaccurate residential energy use projections, leading to inefficient energy planning and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Conduct investigation to adjust assumptions based on projected behavioral changes, and incorporate data on remote working and home cooking into energy use projections","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for studying individual appliance load profiles, survey data analysis tools for understanding behavior changes","People":"Residential building occupants, energy planners, policymakers","Owner":"Data analysts, energy planners, policymakers"},{"Description":"Limited dataset size for 2020 Only dataset and 2018 vs. 2020 dataset","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate or biased conclusions due to insufficient representation of residential energy use patterns","Mitigation":"Acquire more representative and diverse datasets to improve the accuracy of projections and conclusions","Technologies":"Data collection tools, sampling and survey techniques","People":"Data analysts, researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Data collection organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unequal distribution of housing units across states in the datasets","Impact":"Risk of biased conclusions and projections based on unbalanced representation of different geographical regions","Mitigation":"Ensure balanced representation of housing units across different states to avoid skewed conclusions","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping tools, data visualization software","People":"Data analysts, researchers, geographers","Owner":"Data collection organizations, research institutions"}]}
